verbose_text: PTEN is expressed in various cell types, including cardiomyocytes, fibroblasts, endothelial cells and vascular smooth muscle cells, where it modulates cell survival / apoptosis, hypertrophy, contractility, fibrosis and metabolism.
evidence: PTEN is expressed in various cell types, including cardiomyocytes, fibroblasts, endothelial cells and vascular smooth muscle cells, where it modulates cell survival
